TopicTitle: Shortcuts - create a list of all shortcut already in use to avoid conflicts

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I see more and more plug-ins using shortcuts but many of them use the same, and when there is no way to change it, it can be really messy.

What do you think, plug-in with shortcut key, to have some kind of summary of all key already in use ?

Example:

Kerbtown, KAS: CTRL-K

vertical velocity something (configurable), the new stop warp, a few others: z

('z' looks like to be a very popular key )

With such a list (sticky to make sense), plug-in author could be aware of potential conflict and avoid them or provide a setting to change it.

What do you think ?
